item.title: Ubuntu X-server help
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

kloplop, just download the one from nvidia.com, then close the xserver by pressing ctrl + alt + backspace, then do sh ./NVIDIA-installer, then nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf and search for

Driver "nv"
and change nv to nvidia, then restart kdm/gdm/xdm

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest

@moparisthebest wrote:

just do:

sudo nvidia-xconfig

And then restart the X server (ctrl-alt-backspace)
